name: Only One Tree
description:
A game about having to care about only one tree all while struggling with only being able to be in only one place at a time and only do one of the many things that needs doing (shooting the tree feeding zombies and watering the tree)  at a time.

Controls

LMB - Shoot
1-4 - Switch weapon
Space - Interact (Pick up or drop water)
WASD or Arrows - Move
Esc - Quit game 

(Quit using alt-F4 is possible but may lead to threads not closing properly!)

Water the tree and avoid letting the zombies too close!
Water is picked up from one of the four pools in the corner. They refill over time.

This game was made first and foremost for the GMTK Jam 2019 
Made using C++ and our own SFML based engine toolset therefore all shortcomings are our own fault
